resources.string: Ringoid is using geolocation to help you discover people with attractive photos around you.
Verification code has been sent to %s \nIf you have not received SMS within two minutes, please check your phone number or connection
I am of legal age and adult, as defined by the country or state from where I am accessing Ringoid app
I have read and understood Ringoid\'s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Notice
Please accept terms and review your age
Ringoid is like Tinder or Bumble but more interesting and easier to use

• See how many likes your photos receive from opposite gender 
• Check your ranking amongst others in your location 
• Browse feeds of people with attractive photos 
• Discover hot people around you
Ringoid will send an SMS message (carrier charges may apply) to verify your phone number. Enter your country code and phone number:
I have read and agreed to the Terms of Use and the Privacy Notice
We don\'t display age on user profiles and don\'t use age in filters or search.
We don\'t collect or use your name or username, email, password, Facebook details or list of friends, Instagram or LinkedIn ids, contact list from phonebook.

Both you and a person who invited you will receive 50 credits that you can use to 
• Boost your profile (30 credits) 
• Buy extra photo for your profile (200 credits) 
• Super Like someone (15 credits) 
• Super Wink to someone (5 credits) 
• Send Super Text to someone (10 credits)
We will hide your profile from your friend, and your friend\'s profile will be hidden from you. Let\'s make it safer for everyone.
Both you and a person who invited you will receive 50 credits.
To invite others, ask them to open the referral link.
We do not display your location to others and do not show distance between users.
If you want to block someone from seing your photos in Ringoid, you can add their phone number to the blacklist.
Users with the below phone numbers won\'t be able to see or contact you in any way in Ringoid
